thread.title: Time to buy small caps and emerging market debt, says Jon Mackay

title: Time to buy small caps and emerging market debt, says Jon Mackay
text:
Time to buy small caps and emerging market debt, says Jon Mackay 8:15pm GMT - 05:49 
Schroders' investment strategist says emerging market debt offers better price upside and credit quality than U.S. high yield debt in an interview with Reuters' Fred Katayama. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Schroders' investment strategist says emerging market debt offers better price upside and credit quality than U.S. high yield debt in an interview with Reuters' Fred Katayama.
